data.title: Glasscock County
data.text:
Current Election Hours (MARCH 5TH, 2024 Primary Election):

1st week of Early Voting – (Tue.) February 20th, 2024 through (Fri.) February 23rd, 2024, 7am – 4pm

Weekend Early Voting - (Sat.) February 24th, 2024 (6am-6pm)

Weekend Early Voting - (Sun.) February 25th, 2024 (12pm-6pm)

2nd week of Early Voting – (Mon.) February 26th, 2024 through (Fri.) March 1st, 2024, 6am – 6pm

Election Day Voting – March 5th, 2024, 7am – 7pm
